overview:
I.T. Staffing, Recruiting, Solutions & Services, temporary, permanent, contract staffing or multi-site deployments.

An IT guru with over 20 years of sales experience, Scott Nash has many long-time friends and colleagues in the technology industries.

An alum of Lewis University, Nash obtained a B.A. in Mass Communications and Marketing in 1990.

Nash is not only a dutiful father, but also loves to work out, read, travel, cook, and watch movies.

Born and bred in Americaâ€™s Heartland, Nash is described as confident, patient, passionate, optimistic, and sometimes even funny!

Some of his favorite vacation spots include; Italy, France, Spain, Jamaica, Mexico, US Virgin Islands and The Dominican Republic
